name: BuzzaiPro
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Buzzai Pro skill can only work with certain solar panel powered Wi-Fi cameras, it help you control home cameras nice and easy. You can simply ask Alexa to show the online video of Buzzai devices. After connectiong Alexa to your Buzzai product in a few simple steps:

To get startd, please follow the steps below:
1. Install Buzzai Pro APP from App Store and Google Play, connect the camera to Buzzai Pro APP, keep it online and running.
2. Find Buzzai Pro Skill in Alexa App, click"Enable Skill" to link your camera with the Alexa account, then find your camera.
3. Try voice commands like "Alexa, show the bed room" to get live views and check everything's fine in your sweet home.
